ISSUE.TITLE: Total amount mismatch in bestseller report
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 > In Admin > Report > Bestsellers, the total amount of all products is wrong > The total now is calculated as Qty*Product total amount, which made the total amount of all products much bigger than it should be. The total should be sum of all products total, do not times the qty Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/92965/admin-report-calculation-error See also: https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/commit/a3199c357695f4fd29796af2ee62039fec47f56b
